p: Fifth, any efforts to address planetary justice must be accompanied by legal and institutional means to ensure that international support is not funneled into serving the interests of global corporations or the political and economic elites in the Global South. Eradicating the scourge of corruption, for example, would be crucial to realizing pro-poor planetary justice. Corporate-driven corruption has often been implicated in the break-down of relations of accountability between political and economic elites on the one hand and citizen groups on the other (Kramer, 2013).
